content.detailedDescription: Driving ne out of grocery store parking lot mid-afternoon, i spotted in the sky ahead, a white/silver disc against the bottom of a cloud.  it was obviously not a natural part of the sky;  it was something manufactured, made, and don't know why, but i assumed it was metal or ceramic.   it was a perfect round, seemingly-flat disc, face-on, silvery-white, a bit whiter than the moving clouds behind it.   it didn't seem to reflect light.  it didn't move.  its very stillness was part of what made it noticeable.  one of my first fleeting thoughts was that it looked like a coin blank.  most first thought fragments had to do with what it was doing there.  i had the feeling it was watching.  as i drove, i tried to watch it and at the same time find a place i could stop safely to watch it.  it never moved.   i finally turned off on a side street in order to park, -- but it was gone.  i didn't see it move or disappear, nor was i able to find it anywhere else in the sky.  ever since, i scan the sky all the time.  my son in mn says he has seen such discs over minneapolis.
content.summary: White/silver disc "parked" in sky ene of sun city west

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home that night, i noticed a brilliant red, round object in the sky. it was in the southern sky, just sitting motionless. at that distance in the sky (it was up in the sky, not at the horizon) it looked like a solid red, but it was "twinkling". 

i watched it for 10 minutes while driving home. when i looked away for a while, then looked back up, it was gone.

it was not a plane: it did not move in a pattern like a plane, it did not have the white and red blinking landing lights, it never came in closer than where it sat for a touchdown (note: i go by dfw airport every day and watch the planes coming in for landings) and it was round. 

it was not a planet: it was too big, too brilliant and the wrong color red. 

it never moved the entire time i watched it. it was stationary.

i did not think anything about it until i heard about the stephanville sightings (and other sightings at surrounding communities). i felt i should report this sighting as it was close enough to those communities to be related.
content.summary: Brilliant red, glowing oval object

content.detailedDescription: 2 triangular shaped aircrafts flew over heb parking lot 1/15/08 around 6pm central time.  they were flying low at a fast speed, they were in sight for about 1 minute and then dissapeared into the clouds.
content.summary: Triangular shaped aircraft flying side by side over heb parking lot.

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling to florida for family vacation.  we were either near the florida/ga state line on i-75 or just crossing into florida.  as i was bored and looking out the window of our vehicle, i spotted the object as we were in transit.  it remained still, in one place and did not move as long as i could see it.  as we traveled further, within minutes it obviously went out of site.
content.summary: A white or silver object huverring near i-75.

content.detailedDescription:
it was 22:08hrs(est)and i just lied down to go to bed.
as i was lying on my back listening to the hum of the light traffic on the
highway i heard a stange noise.The noise sounded like someone was rubbing their finger on a crystal wine glass.The noise got louder,but not too loud
i then opened my eyes because i knew that the sound was in the air.
what i saw was a dark sky.Then all of a sudden an oval shaped light about 20-25ft across and 90ft in the air came in to my view from the nnw sky.The light moved slowly over my house changing direction twice without turning.As the light was over my house it hovered for about 4 seconds and then left my view traveling nne.
 i wanted to run outside to get a better look but i was scared to move.During this 15 second ordeal i even tried to pretend i was asleep for maybe 2 seconds.I knew what i was seeing was not of this world.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A strange noise and a oval shaped light

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out of my girlfriend's house this morning, looked up and immediately noticed a bright object moving northeast.  it isn't my house, so my direction may be off.  i can confirm it later though.  

it was the same color as a planet or star, but much larger and brighter.  it did not veer or alter speed.  at first, i figured it was a jet, except it was moving way too fast.  it disappeared behind the trees and we could not find it again.  

i think it may have been a satellite re-entering the atmosphere, but i figured i would report it anyway.  just in case someone else saw it.

on a side note: it looked exactly like three ufos i saw at a slumber party about 20 years ago.  except those ufos danced around each other, darting all over the place.  about ten junior high boys witnessed those ufos for a lengthy time.  we sighted them when it was dark and were still watching them as dawn came. that sighting also occurred in the powers area.
content.summary: Fast moving onject

content.detailedDescription: Didn't see actual ufo my daughter and i saw and "x" and a "!" in the nw sky.  it was really weird.  did not look like jet trail.  i have been around military bases my whole life and this did not look like something that was "written" or even maybe by chance.  it was pretty neat though.  i tried to take a picture of it, but it would not show up on my phone.  maybe it was a cloud formation, but never seen one so clear cut.  it was picture perfect.
content.summary: And x and !

content.detailedDescription:
I like to start by saying i don't believe in ufo's but i have to get this off my chest. back in (approximately) 1968 when i was 10 yrs old two friends and i were returning from a walk, we took a left on brown street in east providence heading home when all of a sudden i noticed what appeared to be two full moons. i remember pointing up and saying "hey" look! two moons and we all started laughing and kept walking, when all of sudden we looked up again and noticed that one of the full moon looking objects was hovering right above us so we screamed and ran home and told our parents.  my neighbor heard all the excitment and came over to see what happend so we told her what we saw and she said it had to be a weather balloon so we blew it off even though i wasn't convinced.

the object made no noise or wind and disappeared in seconds. it had this lite orange transparent glow to it that i'll never forget. if i remember clearly the other object was indeed the full moon.

can you check your files and see if there were any other similiar sighting around the area,year and time that i indicated,thanks.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription:
On or about december 1976 myself and about four others were out in the country on the paluxy river, in glen rose, tx. we had just finished up an evening of making our (milk money). we had been spotlighting for the fur business. we were all standing around talking when someone said 'look over there'. i looked but didn't see anything since i was looking on the ground for an animal. up in the sky traveling from glen rose towards us, which would be ese to wnw was a constant bright light at about 2,500 feet. i first saw it at about 30 degrees from the horizon. it was traveling at the speed of a pivate plane. when it reached about 45 degees it stopped and remained motionless for maybe ten seconds. i think someone may have hit it with a spotlight. the spotlights we used were from one million to three million candle power. it then went back in the direction that it came from, i can't recall if it was in the exact direction. it took about two seconds for the light to be out of eyesight. there was no noise to be heard. this was in a very rural area. it was a crystal clear night with no wind. 

we were standing at appoximately 32��� 14' 47"n, 97��� 51' 17"w (nad83/wgs84).
as you can see this is flatland which was cleared of trees and was under cultivation. i had flown a private plane by this time.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Solid low light came toward us, at a 45 degree angle to ground it stopped stayed stationary then retreated and was gone in two seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was a dealer at the city [every sunday] swapmeet + was getting my booth ready in early morning . just before daybreak, i noticed a yellow flickering & looked up + saw what ,at first impression,  was a fireworks- roman candle- shooting from the northwest [ lake side], headed southwest towards the bill williams river. + i thought a boat on the lake fired it. then in a instant, i saw it was a big object, like a stone on fire, burning hot white + red + yellow, + traviling slow as a big millitary jetplane. there were chunks of red hot smaller pieces breaking off + flowing back along the tail of the main head body [ maybe i saw 3 of them]  then as i watched in amazment as the thing just burned out! + stopped burning + for a moment i could see the glow of the head of the object as a light dull red pink. + then it dissapeared into the dark sky + was heading south west towards a mountian range over there. it looked exactly like all the pictures of "a mereorite fireball", that i ever saw! i listened real intently, to see if i could hear any swish or  boom. + i never heard a sound from it.  other swapmeet dealers saw it too + described to me exactly what i saw., so im not crazy!  i think it was a stone meteorite + it slowed down + quit burning + fell not far from havasu city in the hills- maybe 20 miles away??? it weighed maybe 100 lbs or more??? + was going at 500-1000 miles per hour + was a mile up in the air. this is only a guess?  i called a guy in that town who hunts + sells meteorites, + he thought i was pulling his leg! he said that there would had been lots of booming as it broke the sound bearier. im confused, but that what i saw+heard, exactly!. joeadams, idaho. email me if you have anything to add to this story- speedysharp2@hotmail.Com   not sure of the date, but  jan-feb on a sunday morning 600-700.,07 about one year ago. i was a az. winter visiter [snowbird]
content.summary: Appeared to be a large burning stone meteorite, about to fall to the earth

content.detailedDescription:
While visiting tucson over thanksgiving and staying at the hilton el conquistador hotel, i stepped out of my hotel room to admire the full moon over the mountains. i took a picture of the moon and mountains. when i looked at the pic on my computer, i saw an object in the sky. note that i did not see the object with my eye but only in the picture. this was not dust on my camera as i have another pic that was taken a minute later that has no blemish.

believe what you will.
the pic is attached.
content.summary: Something in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking across hyde park from an entrance near marble arch to bayswater. the event i describe occured whilst i had gone up from the path next to the serpentine onto the road bridge crossing it.

the day was a very hot indian summer's afternoon with a mainly clear blue sky.

i noticed the object climbing upwards at a sharp angle as if travelling from the earth into space.

what was most astonishing a t first was that i noticed the airliners were placed beneath the object which already suggested by its form that it was large. if the planes were under and set against the ufo, then it must have been enormous. the question of its size actually made me question what i saw over and over again; and question less the apparent composition of the ufo.

i had the distinct impression that i was watching something that was not a machine in ordinary terms, at least.
the shape of the ufo seemed to be ovoid though i wondered if it might not be circular or even a sphere if looked at from another angle.

around the edge of the ufo was what appeared to be dark red flame, a bit like rocket exhaust. the interior seemed very dark and very intense with energy. i felt that i was watching something organic with its own will reaching for space.

during my sighting(i was leaning against the stonework of the bridge, with cars and pedestrians passing, it was a very fine afternoon) i happened to look down from the bridge atthe narrow pedestrian path which goes underneath it. a couple, who i ascertained to be francophone, were watching it as well. the man shouted up. he told me that he had seen something similar.....In switzerland...I seem to remember.

also a woman who was passing with her family, and who had noticed me looking up had also noticed the ufo. she asked me what it was to which i replied that i didn't know.

the ufo climbed the sky, its size diminishing as it gained height. i eventually left the bridge and continued to walk though i glanced up noticing the ufo was still present for a very long time though it was becoming very small in relation to the earth.

later i looked up a ufo society based in the uk and sent a report. i did not hear anything back. this phenomenon has kept on recurring in my thoughts for years now, and i feel the need to report it again.

i have already seen apparent ufos when i was a teenager stargazing in my back garden. small star shaped  lights that would move at strange angles. stop. then move off at very sharp angles.

recently an area near my childhood home (stirling, scotland) has become known for its sightings of ufos (bonnybridge  (triangle))

i also know of sightings by family members. one of them lived in rhodesia/zimbabwe in the 1950s.

i should probably add that i have experienced parapsychological phenomena at certain moments in my life.




what i found most incredible, in both senses of the word, about the ufo
sighting was a) its apparent immensity

b) the nature of its force. it gave me the impression being extrememly concentrated.

c) about a year later i took a walk across hyde park following roughly the same route to bayswater obviously with the sighting in mind. what i remembered then was that the afternoon of sighting appeared to occur, in terms of motion and atmosphere, in slow motion. i had a definite sense of the dreamlike about the day though i testify that it did occur as i state it.

coincidentally, i happened to flick my tv over one evening, about three months, to a programme i rarely watch, richard and judy, a popular early evening chat programme on channel 4. i was about to flick over again when i heard the word 'ufo' which immediately grabbed my attention.

an airline pilot was being interviewed about his sighting from his plane of a huge ufo he reckoned to be about a mile long.

the recent sighting in texas which, via the net, led me to your organisation, suggested a ufo a mile long.

david menzies
16/1/08

london
content.shape: Cigar,  Circle,  Disc,  Egg,  Fireball,  Oval,  Sphere
content.summary: Extremely large intense mass of heat rising above city. airliners beneath shape.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was driving home from work on alliance parkway at sundown in north east ft. worth, the sun was almost on the horizon and i saw very high up in the sky and a good distance to the south west, a very brightly lit star like object in the sky that appeard to be moving slowly, the speed a distant aircraft would appear to be moving.   i don't think it was a star because there were clouds behind it. and the sky was still too bright to see any stars and also it was moving.  

i thought it was strange but chalked it off to the sun probably reflecting off of a plane, even though the sun was behind the object.  then i saw the article about the sightings in stephenville and i'm thinking maybe i saw the same thing.   i don't know what it was but its possible that i saw the same phenomenon the people in stephenville saw.

i first noticed it as i crossed rt. 377 and was able to see it from there the rest of the way to my house which is off of alta vista.  i didn't bother to linger outside looking at it when i got home because by that time i had convinced myself that it must be light reflecting off a plane.

i've attached a rough sketch of what i saw.  on the sketch the road i was driving on is the white rectangle, the black arrow shows the direction i was headed.   the object is the small white spot at the top to the left, the grey represents clouds, the red arrow shows the direction the object was moving.  the sun is in the approximate position it was in when i first spotted the object.  i've filled in the sky with orange because with the sun setting that is pretty much how the sky looked at the time.
content.summary: Saw a brightly shining object very high in the sky to the south west

content.detailedDescription: The exact date is unsure,but i believe it was june, 1976.  i had just left from visiting my great uncles house, and while driven north on 4th street, just past limit street, i noticed a bright low flying light to the east through the tree line.  i thought is was too bright and too low, and too slow to be a helicopter, and as i continued, i could still see it over the next several miles and i drove, tracking along the missouri river, along the tree line.  long story short, i turned east on cherokee and couldn't see it any more.  i rush home, jumped out of the car and told my mom and dad about the strange lights.  they kinda humored me.  i went outside, climbed a tree just next to our house, and continued to watch out for the light in the east. after 15 minutes or so, i saw the light again, this time much higher, and the craft was a mile or more away - and made a big circle clockwise to the tree i was in -but still no closer than a mile.  i watched it do this twice in a thirty minute time span as it disappeared in the east.  the 3rd time it came around, i ran in the house and convinced my mom and dad to come out, and my sister and older brother did as well.   and what a surprise we had in store.    this time, as the craft made the same circular clockwise journey as it got directly to the north of us (and to the north standing on our doorstep, we can see the dome of the federal penitentiary so we had good lighting and a good reference point), the craft came directly toward us.  it was low this time, about 200 feet in the air, flying at about 5 mph, and the sound i'll never forget - hardly loud enough to be considered a whisper.  while it was still  less than a block away my mother ran into the house to grab a polaroid camera (that was the best we had back them), and a bank of flash bulbs and came back outside.  she was so nervous she couldn't manage to get the bulbs into the camera.  it flew over our heads heading south very slow - 5mph.  the sound was a soft "swoosh", and as it went past us and over the house, it banked to the southeast and we didn't see it anymore.  the craft was about 20 ft in diameter, had white and green lights in the front and a red light on the back.  my dad called in a police report, the police came about 20 minutes later.  my dad sat outside in the police car and filed the report.  there were several reports in the paper (leavenworth times) the following day of ufo sightings , casually dismissed as likely being military related craft (but no craft were confirmed in the area and no comment from the military) since we are so close to ft leavenworth base. i'm an ex-army officer, and even to this day, i've never seen anything like what i saw then.  my father passed away several years ago, but even to this day, i ask my family if that really happened, and mom, my brother and sister (and dad until he passed continually confirm it.  i've often wanted to have the leavenworth police department provide me with a copy of the police report, but i just never did.  maybe mufon will.  i remember drawing what we saw several times, and i believe i gave a copy to the policeman as well after my father explained the story to the policeman, but i'm not really sure of that.  i am sure that it no one in my family to this day believes we saw anything conventional.  for credibility, purposes, i was a captain in the army before i got out, and both of my brothers recently retired from the army as lieutenant colonels. my mother still lives at the same house on the corner where all this happen (14th and delaware).  the tree i climbed was cut down a few years ago, but everything else is pretty much unchanged in the landscape.
content.summary: It flew low - and slow- the 5 of us all saw it -200 ft above us about 5mph.

content.detailedDescription:
We lived in fairy texas in 1983 and at least twice a week we would sit out on the porch and watch the ufos, they were off to the south of us big pale yellow lights. there were always 3 to 5 of them and it went on for 6 months.
 
one night we decided to try and follow them, we drove about 30 to 40 miles south and suddenly there was a hugh flash from the sky and seemed to of landed beside our car, of course we hauled assed and did not stick around to find out what it was.  the light still appeared a few nights a week and we still sat on the porch watching them  but we never chased them again. 
 
so maybe it has always been a sign of the times, of the world ending as we know it or maybe they have just always been over hico, stephenville, fairy, dublin. hamilton ect.
 
sit and watch one night and see if they are still there!!!
 
jkm
content.summary: Big pale yellow lights. there were always 3 to 5 of them and it went on for 6 months.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a picture of a hotair balloon, since i don't see them much in this area. i work in the mountains of western north carolina and was driving on i-40 i took this picture right outside of asheville with my cell phone. i didn't notice another object in the picture until i downloaded it on my computer. i was very surprised to see this image. could you please tell me what it is.
content.summary: I have attached a pic

content.detailedDescription:
I always walk my dogs between 5am & 6am. it was pitch-black except for street lights. that morning i was walking on a street that ended in front of my house.  i was, as usual, walking thinking about somthing with my head down.  i heard a car start up.  as i looked up to see my neighbor's pickup truck i saw this white large object float very very fast over his house & mine and then behind some trees & gone.  it was very low, just above my roof (not something way up in the sky). there were no lights, no sound at all, no exhaust trail.  i live about 5 miles from the naples airport and am used to seeing low-flying planes near my house.  this object was definetly not a plane  & flew much lower & faster than a plane. it flew west to east (like from the gulf of mexico toward the everglades).  i live about 5 miles west of the gulf of mexico & this object was flying east, away from the airport & the gulf.  i was about 200 feet from the front of my house.  it all happened so suddenly that i tried to run toward my house to see it but it disappeared behind my neigbor's trees & when i got to where i could get a better view of the eastern sky it was gone.  it's hard to tell how large it was.  my property is 100' wide.  it was larger than my property and so low that i thought it might have touched the trees.  i only saw it on it's edge.  i do not know how wide it was.  i would say it was more disc-shaped because there was not too much height to it that i could see but i saw it at an angle, so close, that it was too hard to tell. it was a very calm night - not much of a wind at all.  although it may have looked cloud-like i have never seen a  cloud soar by so very very fast and so low in the sky as this did.    

i am a sober, fairly intelligent, 66 year old man.  college graduate.  i am not given to fantacies.  it was so low & so close to me i know it was something i have never ever seen before.  if it hadn't been for my neighbor starting up his truck i would never have seen it becaues it moved so fast and was totally silent.   i contacted another ufo sight on the internet & reported it (i connot remember their name) but have never heard back from them.  i have a feeling they are not in operation.  when i saw a news story today on the today show about ufos in texas they gave your name.  that is why i am contacting you.  my friends, i know, are humoring me.  i hope you will understand. it was a life-altering experience for me.

sincerely.
stephen r. scrivani
content.summary: Cloud-like disc or oval shape (aol, weeks later, showed an accurate photo of it)

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were camping at "rockhound state park" in southern nm. at approximately 3am i awoke, not sure why, possibly "had to go", but at any rate the sky was spectacularly clear, and when i turned around to head back in to our tent, i then saw this "thing" appraoching from the nw heading towards the se. by the lighting of it, it was apparent that it was unusual. several multicolored beams of light shown out from it at various angles,including directly up from it, and judging by the point sources of these beams, it appeared to be massive. it made absolutely no sound of any kind. as it passed directly overhead, i noticed some obvious aircraft trailing behind it, unknown type but sounded like jets at slow speed. there were two of these. they were maybe within a mile of the mystery object. as i could not discern the altitude, it is hard to estimate the size, but based on the relative sizes of the conventional craft following it, i would guess it was maybe up to several hundred feet in volume. again, no shape was discernable. the trailing aircraft had strobes and navigational lights, and were just audible at this distance. some of the beams of light were a electric blue color, one was greenish and three were a magenta shade. the most astounding thing that struck me was the complete silence of it. the only sound was the trailing jets, that i could only hear just after they passed overhead.The object did eclipse background stars, so it did have a body of some kind. i would estimate the speed at around maybe 200mph. this takes into consideration the "slow" moving jets
that trailed behind it.I was so dumbfounded that i forgot to wake my wife until it was well past over head, but woke her up immediatley to see it. her comment was "what the hell is that". also the beams of light were non-diverging. more like thick laser beams that seemed to penetrate out indefinately. my feelings were simply one of awe. i am an amatuer astronomer and licsensed ham radio operator. my profession is a power engineer of 26 years. i am submitting this experience now because of the recent sighting in tx that sounds almost identical to the one i witnessed. i have only mentioned this experience to a very few close friends that i know and trust. i have seen many different "apperations" in the night sky due to my experience as an amatuer astronomer, but i know i witnessed something truely spectacular and mind boggling that night and will never forget it. and no, i did not find any decent geodes at rockhound state park, but the camping fee was well worth it!
content.summary: Huge multi-lighted craft followed-escorted by conventional aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I walked out on to the back deck which faces south just after dark, i looked up towards the lower eastern sky and saw a light traveling from east to west which would be south of fort worth. it caught my eye because of the speed it was traveling, i knew it was not an airplane and thought for a second that it was a satellite. after watching it though i realized it wasn't a satellite either because of the shape. my friend and i had gone out on the deck to have a cigarette, and by the time i told him to come over and look it was gone. i was pretty excited about what i saw as he can tell you. but didn't report it until now after seeing the stephenville story. it was fairly distant to me in fort worth, but now after reading about the stephenville story, i would think that would be about the right distance and direction as what i saw. i'm positive this was not an airplane or satellite, there is nothing i've seen that travels that fast.
content.summary: Long narrow light

content.detailedDescription: I stopped to take a picture of laramie peak at sunset.I was facing west about 2 miles east of interstate 25.As you can see ,it is a nice sunset.I don't know what the objects in the left hand side of the photo are.I was hoping you could tell me.This picture was shot with a 700c olympus digital camera.
content.summary: I was taking a picture of a sunset.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in sw fort worth, about five miles east of benbrook and about two miles east of benbrook lake.  my dish went out six or seven times last night, one after the other, during a period of about an hour and ten minutes.  it started at 8:00 and ended about 9:10.  the sky was clear and the stars bright.  it's only gone out during storms before.  

it first went out right at 8pm, seconds after "comanche moon" started.  after finding the signal again, it came on for a few minutes then went out again.  after about the third time i thought about something blocking the signal.  thinking of the stephenville incident, i went outside to see if that ufo was was out there.  i didn't see anything, but while i was out there the naval air station (the old carswell afb) sent up 3 to 5 jets that came south from the base and then turned to the west southwest.  i'm about ten miles south of the base and the dublin/stephenville area is about 50 miles to the wsw. 

after about the third outage i called direct tv tech help and got no one, holding for what seemed like over ten minutes.  after about the fifth time i called again, holding again and never speaking to anyone, but this time the phone was filled with so much static it was unbearable, and i hung up.  the phone was land line, not my cell phone.   

i went back outside again to look up into the night, and again saw nothing but stars in a beautiful night sky.

i'm reporting this because all of these incidents have never happened before, and i thought it was ironic in light of the reports coming out of stephenville on the 14th -- something one mile long and one-half mile wide -- the service interruptions, the jets, the static, etc.  

maybe you can use this to help piece the puzzle together. 

richard barron
fort worth
content.summary: Wierd occurances in the sw sky

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting on the side of my bed in the dark, after a trip to the bathroom.
i happened to look out the window up to (the southern sky) and i saw what looked like a very bright star and thought it strange it was so bright this morning.  it seemed much closer than a normal star. it was still dark outside and the night sky was dark but seemed clear from my view point. 
suddenly the object changed to a triangular shape, like a florescent light with the middle empty.  it became brighter for a second and then just began to fade out completely and was gone.
all this happended in the span of about fifteen second or lesss. it did not return and i waited, even did a mental thought message requesting a repeat, but no go.   the object did not move it was still during the whole event.
the event was so strange as i normally look out my bedroom window to the sky and am familiar with the night sky in my area. 
so that is it for my first ufo sighting. it was awsome.
content.summary: Bright star turned to triangle shape then faded away

content.detailedDescription:
Hi everyone

my story is a short one but nonetheless it was unexplainable(at least to me).Every night i go out on the balcony of my appartment as a way to calm myself by breathing some fresh air and gazing at the stars.But as i was sitting on my chair i suddenly saw to the west (wich at that time was almost always a flight path for many jets and aircraft) some kind of aircraft i suppose wich had the distinct look of a red star.I dont know the approximate distance from me and the object since i have no idea how large this object was.But i believe it could have been roughly 5-8km.
i didnt believe it was a regular aircraft nor a passanger jet of some kind,since the object was at first stationary,it showed no movement,but after about 5 seconds after i saw it it started moving in clockwise direction around me,i had my binoculars for such exact curious events by my side but i was too shocked to even move and i just kept observing its every move.The "object" was glowing a bright redish glow with a clear sphere-like shape altough i cant be certain.If the distance to the object was 5-8km then the object must have been hovering at 1km above the ground
roughly calculated that is.Tough the best describtion for this "aircraft" is a red star appearence and a prefect oval red glow around it.As i was sayingit started moving perfectly smooth towards the northeast in a clockwise direction around me,with possibly 800km/h altough it looked relatively slow it steadily went behind the next building and i lost sight of it for about a minute,then it reapeared again with the same flightpath and unchanged route still moving steadily in a wide circle around me(altough i didnt realise this at first).After about 5 minutes it was exactly on the clear horizon to the north of me.At that point for 5 whole minutes i did nothing but gaze at the object and try to figure out what it was,and strangely enough i felt nothing as if it calmed me to watch it(or it could have been the shock of something so significant) 
when the object reached north it continued to hover and move steadily across again a clear flightpath now towards the east and thensouth east and then (clockwise).After another 5 minutes of staring at the objecs slow movement it reached a spot wich for my view was blocked by several tall trees,i could still see the glow tough(barely)and at that point it stopped moving after completing a perfect 180 degree (half circle) around me after waiting for any signals of lights or any more strange behaviour from the object for about 10 seconds it just stood still and in an instant bolted through the sky and i lost sight of it.I still havent seen this odd object,aircraft again to this day...

i hope that someone could shed light on what i saw or at least share some similar sighting to help me understand what exactly i saw

thanks in advance
content.summary: Ufo circles along a clear parameter around me

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were both juniors attending u.Of fl. it was sometime during the summer. i was over at his off-campus apt., which was a large complex of 2 story apt. buildings. i was in the living room listening to an album, and he was standing outside on his 2nd floor balcony. he started laughing, and called for me to come look at something. when i when out on the balcony, he pointed up to a spot that was across the parking lot, to the edge of the property that was bordered with very tall trees (pine?), maybe 75 yards away, and hovering some seemingly close distance above these very tall trees was a bright ball of sparkly light, about the size (not shape) of a small car. what i have always remembered about that moment was that it reminded me of a hand held sparkler (like at a 4th of july celebration), that kind of bright, intense light.  we were both in complete amazement. as we watched it for maybe 20-30 seconds, it seemed to remain stationary. on a side note, i rememberd how odd it was to see a guy walking across the parking lot in the distance, carrying a case of beer, and he had no idea about what was occuring above his head.
so my friend and i decide to run down stairs, across the parking lot to get a closer look. once we got downstairs and started running towards this object, it now seemed to be a little further away, and a little higher up, than it first appeared. so since his car was close by, we got in and headed off down the street to get a closer look. well this turned out to be quite a ride. it was still light out when we first saw this object. as we left the street that the apt. was on, we headed onto a main highway, now heading south for a few miles. then we headed west as the object seemed to be getting further and higher away with each passing minute. we continued west until we reached the outskirts of town, and now we had to go north to keep tracking it. i remember that it was now getting dark as we were heading north, leaving the city limits. by now this ball was starting to look  more like the brightest star in what was a very clear, full moon (or close to it) night, becoming smaller as it got further away. 
finally, we were a few miles beyond the city, out in a rural area, where we stopped on a two lane, just before this road crossed over interstate 4. we got out and just stood quietly looking up at this incredible night sky, filled with stars, but the one we had been chasing was the brightest. it was up in the northwest sky, at about 10 o'clock. it seemed to be staionary, and so we both started just gazing around at all of the sky, and our surrondings. we were probably looking around for a few minutes when nicky yelled to me, "look"...I spun around and looked up to where this object had been, and it was now moving very fast across the sky,towards the east, (from a 10 o'clock position to a 2 o'clock position)where it suddenly stopped as it "appeared" to meet another star. after a few seconds, it took off again in the direction of the moon, and as it lined up between us and the moons brightness, it seemed to disappear. 

although  i have recounted this story over the past 34 years to probably a dozen people, i've always wanted to share it with someone who really understands this reality. and now that i've just shared this most personal and amazing experience with a complete stranger, i'm hoping that you will reply with maybe a confirmation of this sighting from your records, but more importantly, some general information regarding our experience, in terms of this type of ufo experience.  

also, i really can't remember the exact month, but it was certainly summer. and it was at, or around, a full moon, and it was a friday.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A ball of sparkling light that we followed for over 40 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: While standing in the yard i caught a sight i wasn't expecting. i could see a bright white light that appeared to be growing in intensity and size in the sky to the south. it grew to about 2 or 3 times smaller than the moon, in other words this thing was the largest bright object in the sky except for the moon. it was very high, in the neighborhood of 30 thousand feet. once it grew to what i would call its peek intensity it appeared to begin falling straight down and began to dim. it then began moving due south at a consistent altitude and dimming to about what an aircraft or satellite would resemble including the speed at which it was moving.
content.summary: Very large bright white light

content.detailedDescription:
I am contacting you regarding what appears to be a plaster of paris mold made of an alien���s head that my brother and i currently have in our possession. my brother found it while hiking in the ���back country��� in east san diego county in 1996. he came across it while hiking in an open area/meadow and kicked it over, thinking it was some kind of whitish rock. when he did, he saw that it was hollow inside, so he took it home. we later examined its interior using a couple mirrors and lamps and saw that it was an apparently unbroken plaster mold made by ���plastering��� the large, oblong, lobed head of an alien-looking creature. 

although it is a bit difficult seeing around inside the large, heavy plaster cast, the eyes and nostrils are clearly visible by looking in at an angle through the neck opening, as well as bony-looking brow protuberances above each eye, two ���lobe��� impressions at the back of the inner scull, prominent ridges running crosswise along the length of the inside of the cranium, and many features that look like the impressions made by folds and wrinkles in the skin of the neck and so forth.

we have no idea whatsoever as to whether this is a cast of a genuine alien���s head or some simple joke, fraud, artistic endeavor, or whatnot. at the time we found it there certainly didn���t seem to have been any efforts made by anyone to exploit it in any way. it seems to us that one possible explanation is that one or more individuals came across a dead alien and buried it with its head sticking up out of the ground (or found it in that condition) and returned with plastering materials and encased the head in plaster. it would seem then that the plaster mold was never retrieved and that over time the materials composing the alien���s head simply deteriorated and were eaten away such that by the time my brother came across the plaster cast it was still intact and yet empty. when my brother found it the open, neck part was partially buried in the ground while the covering of the ���skull��� was barely visible above the surrounding grass.

but of course this is all shear speculation. at the time my brother found this oddity and brought it to my mother���s home in campo, ca, my mother was dying of cancer and we were caring for her during her final days. our mother was a very religious person (christian, protestant) and in her weakened state she imagined that the cast was an evil presence and she did not want it in or around her house. she was not satisfied until my brother had heaved it out into a field nearby our house. that was in 1996, the year our mother died. 

until two weeks ago i had assumed that strange plaster cast had been lost to us for good, but i have thought about it many times and have wished we could have had it examined by some experts. we still own my mother���s old house, although it has not been kept up or lived in a number of years. in visiting there a few times over the years i have walked the field where we through that cast, but i could never find it.

over this past holiday season (christmas 2007) my brother was visiting the old house in campo when he came across something wrapped in a bundle of garbage bags in a corner of the covered carport. when he opened all the bags he found that old plaster cast we hadn���t seen in all those years. the only explanation for this i can think of is that over the months my mother was dying we had many family members coming and going and apparently one of more of them found the mold and stored it away in protective garbage bags. all i can say is good for them.

i can���t say that we hold out a terribly great expectation that this is truly a cast made of an alien���s head, but we���ve just got to know ��� one way or another. i have been an avid listener of the art bell show for many years and have heard some good things about mufon ��� so i thought i would start with our local branch right here in san diego.

i���m sure this is not the typical sort of case you deal with, but maybe you could steer us in the right direction in finding someone who could determine just what this thing we have is. we would appreciate any help you could give us. i have enclosed three photos with brief descriptions:

pict #1: photo of the face which is located inside the end of the cast with the large, protruding, frontal lobe. you can see the two eyes halfway down the photo, with the nostrils located between, a little lower than the eyes. there is some sort of brow-like protuberance above and to the inside of each eye.

pict #2: photo looking down into neck hole of the cast. you can some of the cranium ridges and some of the wrinkles in the neck.

pick #3: photo showing cast in position in which it was found ��� with neck opening on bottom. (apple added to give size perspective.) the cranial lobe to the right (the frontal lobe, containing the face) is at least twice as large as the one to the left (the back of the head). there are two small lobe (saucer-like) impressions at the back of the head inside.]

thanks for the help,



arthur leach
content.summary: Found what appears to be a plaster cast of an alien head

content.detailedDescription:
Hello mufon:
i am reporting a brief sighting that i experienced a few years ago. i would have emailed the details at that time, except that i only recently learned that people may report sightings to you here.

i am not 100% sure about the date.

these are the details of which i am sure:

it was at night, around 12 or 12:30am.  i was standing on a second floor balcony, stargazing.  i was facing north and looking at the constellations and studying the perceived colors of distinctive stars and noting the usual visible satellites and their 'flash patterns'.  i had binoculars hanging around my neck.  there were constant passersby on the street below - individuals, couples and small groups of females, males and coed groups.  it was a clear night with a clear sky.

suddenly and unexpectedly - a large, dark, triangle-shaped object entered my field of vision from above and behind me (from the south).  it was unexpected as there were no sounds projected ahead of it, nor any accompanying it.  nor were there any lights or physical vibrations preceding or accompanying it.  it traveled in a straight line, following a trajectory directly through where i had been looking.

i instantly realized that this object was not any type of aircraft which i had ever seen - civilian, commercial or military.  nor was it a helicopter or a dirigible/balloon.  it's lines were straight and corners sharp.  i had never seen anything like it before this moment.

it had no illuminated lights on it - a basic requirement of aircraft in flight.  there were no signs of there being any sources of light on it.  in fact, there was nothing visible on the large, dark shape that i was scrutinizing and a bit stunned by.

it was "rocketing" across the night sky above me, heading north.  i say "rocketing", because it was racing.  not only was its speed unusual, but so was the fact that it never made a sound.  nor did it, at any time, cause any vibrations.  i thought this odd because it was flying lower than commercial aircraft and was moving much faster than they do... and those aircraft are always accompanied by audible rumbling and, occasionally, by vibrations as they pass over.

these initial perceptions happened in seconds and i had instantly realized that what i was seeing was something unusual and unique.  i immediately reached for the binoculars hanging around my neck.  as i lifted them to my eyes, i  quickly glanced to a point ahead of where i had just seen the object - above the street in front of me and not quite halfway across the sky - so i knew where to point the binoculars... and i was stunned to find that it was already gone.  completely gone - no lights shrinking as it continued on its path - no vapor, smoke or exhaust trail left behind.  nothing.  i was amazed that it was gone - in less than 5 seconds, that there was no sign of it anywhere in the sky (it was a clear night) and that not one other person on the ground ever noticed it or looked up.

i felt fortunate, like i had just seen something special. i make no assumptions about it.  i don't know what it was. the 'most-logical'(and least imaginative) assumption might be that it's something being tested by the military.  no surprise if it was.  and it wouldn't be the first time a secret(why else fly at night with no lights on?), dark, silent, swift and (unsuccessfully)stealthy object flew over my head - i tend to notice such things, even if no one else does.

i have read of a number of other sightings involving triangle-shaped objects in the sky, so i thought it might be worth adding my own amazing, albeit brief, sighting.

thank you for the opportunity.

i'll keep looking up.
i'll definitely let mufon know if(when) i have any noteworthy observation.

best regards.
content.summary: On balcony, facing n, stargazing. large, black triangle appeared from s. not an airplane. big fast & silent. disappeared in secs. no one else noticed it.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my parents back porch at approximately 10:30 pm.  it was a dark moonless night and we did not have any lights on as i was leaving their home at the time.  i was looking back to the south over my mothers shoulder as we were talking and i saw a small white sphere above the horizon.  at first i thought it was a landing light of a plane.  its diameter grew and as it grew it turned dark red and then faded out and back in twice.  this all happened in approximately 45 seconds.  i called this to my mothers attention and she turned to watch it.  i stood and described this unusual light to my mother for about 5 minutes when it suddenly reappered at a higher elevation. at this time the object had an orange hue to it. it stayed in the same position for about 15-20 seconds and then a smaller reddish orange spherical object shot out of it up and to the right.  the larger object then went left across the horizon very rapidly and disappeared.  we then had another encounter on 12/22/07 at about 11:00pm.  i was with my sister coming down the hill from our parents home when i spotted another unusual object in the sky.  it started out small and white and grew to a large lime green sphere.  it flashed once and then shot off rapidly to the right and disappeared.  my sister saw the end of it as it was shooting off.  both of these events happened within 5 miles of each other in the sky.
content.summary: Small white circle expanding to very large dark red object and small red sphere shot off from larger object

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a ufo (i think) tonight.  i was going to kraver's seafood to pickup an order of fish for dinner.  i was driving west on county road 64 in loxley, al and saw this bright light in the western sky toward daphne, al. the light was obstructed by some trees in a short time and as i approached the intersection of county road 66 and county road 64 i saw the light again in which is was much brighter and appeared to be a cluster of lights; so i pulled off the road and parked my car beside a cabbage patch and watched it for a minute or so.  i remembered that i had my camera in the car so i took a couple of pictures of the image (the first picture did not show the object because i was aiming the camera with my arm ouside of the window without using my viewer.) the second picture was a little better because the image appears in the lower left.  i have attached the picture taken from my car.  it (ufo) is in the lower left corner of the picture.  it stood still there for about a minute in air and the lights would dim and then get real bright.  i used my canon powershot a620 640x480 resolution.  it was dark and i was surprise that i was able to capture the image.  it started toward me and i didn't hang around and left for the restaurant.

if you enlarge the object you can clearly see 3 large lights and 1 smaller in the back/rear?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Oject with 4 lights (white) of which 3 were bright and dimmed and 1 smaller light  in boomerang like formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work on the morning specified, and was talking to a co-worker. i was looking out our office attrium which is in the middle of our office with a full opening to a view of the sky above.  i dont know the sq. ft. as i'm not good at estimating that but it's a large attrium. as my co-worker was talking my eyes wandered to the sky above and i noticed an airplane flying overhead which was not out of the ordinary since we see airplanes all the time being that lax is not far from marina del rey. most or all airplanes take off from lax going west and circle the ocean then turn to their destinations.  as i was watching this large regular size airplane, (like a 747 or similar), i noticed a shiny silver, round looking object come up fast from behind it and it started following on the lower right side of the plane.  i kept watching it as my co-worker was talking to me, as it was going faster then the plane now, and it was too high in the sky to be a helicopter, or small cessna, and traveling much to close.  even so it was round shiny and silver.  i stopped my co-worker from talking and pointed it out to him, and as i was trying to show it to him, the object sped past the airplane and took off. i'm not sure what it was,. but i know what it wasnt.  my co-worker did not see it, as he was looking farther right of the airplane then the object was. now given the speed an airplane travels, for this to out run an airplane, was not something i've seen before. i was floored, surprised and excited at the same time.
again the plane was too high for the object to be a helicopter following or a cessna, and too close even if it were, for safetey reasons.  the speed in which it traveled, and took off was to say the least pretty damn fast and too fast for it to be another aircraft to out run an airplane at that speed, height, and size. i then lost sight of it, as it took off fast, going southeast ahead of the airplane, i realized i'd just seen something i'd never seen before.  i know what helicopters look like, large passenger airplanes/jets and cessnas, as i live between marina del rey and lax, and have lived in this surrounding area my entire life, so i see all aircraft flying reguarly every day all day, so this was most definately out of the ordinary. again it was small, silver shiny, round / egg shaped, and traveled at a high rate of speed.  i dont know how long it was trailing the plane or if the plane even knew it was there.   
so that's my story.  my first time seeing something in the skys that i was not sure what it was, but i know what it wasnt.  
thanx for reading,
mdr, ca
content.summary: Following underneath an airplane that was flying southeast
